title: so riven flash q does work anymore?...

replies.body:
You probably all do what my friend does. I don't know exactly what he does, but when he Flash-Qs he messes something up so the Q stops halfway through.

Edit: Yeah, the only time it hasn't worked is when I've Q-Flashed instead of Flash-Q'd.
Good, next step nerf the shit out of her shield and bonus AD from passive and ult, or delete her that works too.

Not sure what you're asking.

If you're asking if it still works, yes.
Go test in a custom, it actually doesn't (or didn't for me when i tested it)
